entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:19 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 01:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -38.2°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -42.4°C
Wind: WNW 14 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
